comments:
Build  I20050104-1600

When an error occurs in the target workspace you will get a continual error
occured error dialog because of the following problem.

We should only get one dialog and then the connection should be terminated. This
is particularly easy to get when there is a Stack Overflow. In this case Tod had
 to shut down Eclipse and restart.

!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Debug".
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.jdi.TimeoutException: Timeout occurred while waiting for packet 4694
	at
org.eclipse.jdi.internal.connect.PacketReceiveManager.getReply(PacketReceiveManager.java:160)
	at
org.eclipse.jdi.internal.connect.PacketReceiveManager.getReply(PacketReceiveManager.java:169)
	at org.eclipse.jdi.internal.MirrorImpl.requestVM(MirrorImpl.java:174)
	at org.eclipse.jdi.internal.MirrorImpl.requestVM(MirrorImpl.java:192)
	at org.eclipse.jdi.internal.MirrorImpl.requestVM(MirrorImpl.java:207)
	at org.eclipse.jdi.internal.ThreadReferenceImpl.name(ThreadReferenceImpl.java:270)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.model.JDIThread.getName(JDIThread.java:971)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.JDIModelPresentation.getThreadText(JDIModelPresentation.java:316)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.JDIModelPresentation.getText(JDIModelPresentation.java:250)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.LazyModelPresentation.getText(LazyModelPresentation.java:157)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DelegatingModelPresentation.getText(DelegatingModelPresentation.java:160)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.DebugViewLabelDecorator$LabelJob.run(DebugViewLabelDecorator.java:323)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:66)
Can you provide an example to reproduce? Where did the error dialogs appear?

I don't get is consistently but here are the circumstances

1) There is an error in code that gets hit frequently (such as a callback from 
SWT that fires a lot)
2) we get an "Internal Error has occured dialog"
3) Close it.
4( You keep getting them but it is impossible to kill the self hosted 
workspace because the dialogs come up before the repaint.
Unable to reproduce. Please reopen if a reproducible test case is found.

traces.message: Timeout occurred while waiting for packet 4694
